plot: 5 years since Tim Bains was strangled to death by the spirit of Johnny Thornhill. Tim's brother, Terry, has since had odd premonitions. Will Terry rid his house of Johnny once and for all, or suffer the same fate as his brother before him?
title: Visions of Vengance 2: Night Terrors
plot_es: 5 years since Tim Bains was strangled to death by the spirit of Johnny Thornhill. Tim's brother, Terry, has since had odd premonitions. Will Terry rid his house of Johnny once and for all, or suffer the same fate as his brother before him?
plot_en: 5 years since Tim Bains was strangled to death by the spirit of Johnny Thornhill. Tim's brother, Terry, has since had odd premonitions. Will Terry rid his house of Johnny once and for all, or suffer the same fate as his brother before him?
